trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were 3 other sightings in Fort Worth on or around March 27th 2007
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring the night on March 27th, 2007,in Arlington, TX, I went outside with my friends to show them how well my new telescope worked in the night sky. About then minutes pass, and I just look around the night sky, enjoy the stars, when I see what I believed to be a bright star, at that moment. This "star" was brighter than anyother around it, and it just stood there, very bright and not moving an inch. I then decide to my friends that I wanted to gaze at this beautiful "star". I turn around with my telescope, and in my amazement, this object started moving, fast. It slowed down after coming a quarter off from west, then sped up and got brighter. The moon was nice and big during this moment. It seemed to be flying towards it. After a minute of awkward flight, of extreme stopping, to extreme speeds, it flew, as I saw it, infront of the moon. I expected it to fly accross the moon and appear on the other side. Instead it disapeared. My friends and I all pondered on what this object could have been. I ruled out a helicopter, plane, or comet. In the end, I couldn't figure out what this object was. It was a UFO. Recently my nights have been more or less awkward. I researched on time loss effects, and as I felt them. In a night, I didn't move an inch, and wake up, a mear couple of seconds, before my alarm clock went off. If any physical problems have occured, I don't know, yet some sleepless nights come off some awkward dreams.
Summary: Bright, Fast, Not Natural, Star and Stop Flight, What now?
